Texts.Chs: 从这个世界的深处中偶尔会传来...你听，又来了！这声音一定是某种可怕的生物发出的，它或许就潜伏在那里，我觉得你有必要去调查到底是怎么回事。
Texts.Eng: From deep below me, I can hear...no, feel...^orange;something dark and terrible^reset; lurking in the abyssal darkness. Dare I investigate the ^orange;source of that slurping, wet cacaphony^reset;?

Texts.Chs: 就是这样，结束了。我曾经对这个世界恐惧万分。但是现在我已经不再畏惧，感觉一切都是如此的美好。
Texts.Eng: That's it. I'm done. That place was terrifying beyond my capacity to tolerate. But I killed that abomination, and feel pretty darned amazing now.
